project_descr: THE PREPARATION OF SAINT LUCIA'S SECOND NATIONAL COMMUNICATION ON CLIMATE CHANGE.

outputs.output_descr:
Preparation of Saint Lucia Second National Communication to the United National Framework on the Convention of Climate Change and the enhancement of national capacity to plan for, mitigate and adapt to climate chnge and to support the incorporation of climate change considerations into national sustainable  development plannind and decision-making are the overall objectives of the project.  The outputs associated with this project are:
Ouput 1:  An inventory of greenouse gases for the year 2000.
Output 2:  Identification of strategies and measures to abate the emission of greenhouse gases
Output 3.  An assessment of the impacts of climate change on the various economic and natural systems and relevant adaptation measures : and 
Outpout 4:  The preparation of Saint Lucia's Second National Communication to the UNFCCC.
